mapper.select:
select count(*) from shipment_info s inner join pipe_basic_info p on p.pipe_no=s.pipe_no inner join contract_info c on c.contract_no=p.contract_no inner join project_info pro on pro.project_no= c.project_no
AND pro.project_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project_no},'%')
AND s.shipment_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shipment_no},'%')
AND s.pipe_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pipe_no},'%')
AND s.vehicle_plate_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vehicle_plate_no},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(s.shipment_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{begin_time},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND DATE_FORMAT(s.shipment_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')<DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{end_time},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')

select s.*,pro.project_no,pro.project_name,p.contract_no,p.od,p.wt,p.p_length,p.weight,p.status from shipment_info s inner join pipe_basic_info p on p.pipe_no=s.pipe_no inner join contract_info c on c.contract_no=p.contract_no inner join project_info pro on pro.project_no= c.project_no
AND pro.project_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{project_no},'%')
AND s.shipment_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shipment_no},'%')
AND s.pipe_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pipe_no},'%')
AND s.vehicle_plate_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vehicle_plate_no},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(s.shipment_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')>=DATE_FORMAT(#{begin_time},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
AND DATE_FORMAT(s.shipment_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')<DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{end_time},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00')
ORDER BY id DESC limit #{skip},#{take}

select * from shipment_info s
AND s.shipment_no=#{shipment_no}
